replies.body:
This is the first real* update mojang has done for a while, so people are just going to have to wait for plugins to update.


*By "real" I mean an update that really changed the features of the game. I consider all of the 1.7 updates (1.7.1, 1.7.2, 1.7.5, 1.7.9, 1.7.10) to all be a single update, just spread over a long period of time. Before the 1.7's, Mojang always had a normal update that had new features and then occasionally a sub update would be released to fix a bug or something. e.i. 1.2 and 1.2.5

replies.body: By "lock entities" I assume you are talking about spawning in a mob with no AI (This means they will just sit there and do nothing) What you want to do is type /summon Creeper ~ ~ ~ {NoAI:1}  - Just replace "Creeper" with whatever mob you want to spawn without AI. I hope this was what you were asking, but if not just ask me again!

replies.body:
place a chest, then put a command block somewhere. in the command block put:

/blockdata x y z (chest coordinates) {Lock"Name" (any word)}

now, any item that is named as the word you put in "Name" can open the chest. if anyone tries to open the chest with anything else, it'll say it's locked.
